channel.title: EasyRSC webclient / Forum?
channel.description:
Okay, I know it's a txt file based server but is there any way to convert it? Like what files should I edit in order to convert it, I understand SQL & PHP, FTP, Host's, etc.. like that just not very good with what files to edit yet in EasyRSC.
I want to be able to make a forum, have people register and use their forum name to login and have the ability to use a web client if they want... But the thing is I dont know where to connect any of this together, so I have no approach any help would be great, I googled, I searched and I found good stuff... pre-made stuff kind of but connecting the two I dont understand?
